abstract: The chief executive of Discovery Communications told advertisers on Wednesday that the Hispanic market promises significant growth when compared to mainstream cable channels.
snippet: The chief executive of Discovery Communications told advertisers on Wednesday that the Hispanic market promises significant growth when compared to mainstream cable channels.
lead_paragraph: To underscore the priority that Discovery Communications says it is placing on Hispanic viewers, the president and chief executive, David Zaslav, made a herculean effort to attend the Discovery U.S. Hispanic upfront presentation at the Four Seasons restaurant in Midtown Manhattan on Wednesday.

headline.main: Upfronts: Discovery Ups the Stakes in Hispanic Media
